messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Scary TV
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/3/2005 5:19:55 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: When somebody is watching tv there, it s difficult
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/3/2005 5:19:55 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
When somebody is watching tv there, it's difficult for the younger children
to get away from it if they're scared because I'm usually in this area and they
want to be with me.
***********
How about headphones for the older one? Taking scary sounds away will remove
alot of the tension.

Elissa
Mystik Hill Farm
Kearneysville, WV


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
